props.name: children
props.docblock: An element rendered inside the `Page Banner`.

description.text: An element rendered inside the `Page Banner`.

props.name: dismissible
props.docblock: Boolean used to control whether `Page Banner` is dismissible.

description.text: Boolean used to control whether `Page Banner` is dismissible.

props.name: dismissAltText
props.docblock: An element to be set as the dismiss button's alt text (preferably a translated string).

description.text: An element to be set as the dismiss button's alt text (preferably a translated string).

props.name: onDismiss
props.docblock: A function to be called on dismiss of the `Page Banner`.

description.text: A function to be called on dismiss of the `Page Banner`.

props.name: show
props.docblock: Boolean used to control whether the Page Banner shows.

description.text: Boolean used to control whether the Page Banner shows.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: A string designating which color variant of the `Page Banner` to display

description.text: A string designating which color variant of the `Page Banner` to display
